channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-37499|2024-09-27T21:57:44.313Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A Persistent Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability can be carried out in a certain field of the Unica Platform. An attacker could hijack a user's session and perform other attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37500|2024-09-27T21:57:37.608Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A Persistent Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability can be carried out on certain pages of Unica Platform. An attacker could hijack a user's session and perform other attacks.
